title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the LiteraryTimeMachine project, including the desired input and output formats, supported historical periods, performance and scalability requirements, and any other relevant constraints or guidelines.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the LiteraryTimeMachine project, including the main components (Text Analysis Module, Language Transformation Module, Text Generation Module, User Interface), data flow (data input, processing, output, and storage), and integration points. The design should emphasize modularity, scalability, maintainability, and be extendable for future features. Consider edge cases, error handling, performance optimizations, and ensure adherence to best practices. Additionally, consider the requirements for data storage, deployment, and ensure that the system is secure.

title: Develop Text Analysis Module
description: Implement the text analysis module responsible for parsing and analyzing input texts, extracting relevant linguistic features, and preparing data for the language transformation and generation components.

title: Develop Language Transformation Module
description: Implement the language transformation module responsible for converting modern texts into historical styles or adapting classical works into contemporary language, based on the extracted linguistic features and predefined rules or models.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the LiteraryTimeMachine application, allowing users to input texts, select historical periods or language styles, and view the transformed output.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for the LiteraryTimeMachine project, including databases or other storage solutions for linguistic rules, models, and user data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Evaluate and implement appropriate security measures for the LiteraryTimeMachine application, including user authentication, data encryption, and protection against potential vulnerabilities or attacks.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the LiteraryTimeMachine project, including automated builds, testing, and deployment processes to ensure efficient and reliable software delivery.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities for the LiteraryTimeMachine project, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation and user guides for the LiteraryTimeMachine project, including technical documentation, installation and configuration guides, and user manuals.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Management
